snippet: A Maryland woman was educated at some very proper institutions, but the education that mattered most to her came from auto-shop classes, studying under a charismatic instructor and working on a 1978 Camaro.
abstract: Marie Lerch of Kensington, MD, took auto mechanic classes, and put that knowledge to work on 1978 Chevrolet Camaro she purchased; car repair was a welcome contrast to her life as a business woman.
lead_paragraph: A Maryland woman was educated at some very proper institutions, but the education that mattered most to her came from auto-shop classes, studying under a charismatic instructor and working on a 1978 Camaro.

headline.main: In This Auto-Shop Class, Life Lessons Were Part of the Curriculum
headline.print_headline: In This Auto-Shop Class, Life Lessons Were Part of the Curriculum
